metadata.title: CVE-2024-47737 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfsd: call cache_put if xdr_reserve_space returns NULLIf not enough buffer space available, but idmap_lookup has triggeredlookup_fn which calls cache_get and returns successfully. Then wemissed to call cache_put here which pairs with cache_get.Reviwed-by: Jeff Layton <jlayton@kernel.org>

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
